com.tiggerbiggo.prima.core

Class Vector2

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tiggerbiggo.prima.core.Vector2

  • public class Vector2
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a vector in 2D space. Also contains various methods for calculation.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        Absolute value of the input vector where both components are positive

      • normalize

        public static Vector2 normalize(Vector2 in)

        Returns a normalized (magnitude = 1) copy of a given Vector

        Special Cases:

        • If the magnitude of the given vector is 0, the result will be Vector2.ZERO (0,0)
        • If the given vector is null, the result will also be null
        Parameters:
        in - The vector to normalize
        Returns:
        The normalized vector

      • rotateAround

        public static Vector2 rotateAround(Vector2 in,
                                   Vector2 rotatePoint,
                                   double angleRadians)
        Rotates a given vector around a point and returns the result
        Parameters:
        in - The vector to rotate
        rotatePoint - The point to rotate around
        angleRadians - The angle to rotate in radians
        Returns:
        The rotated vector
